body:
As most of you probably already know, Carrie Fisher passed away today at the age of 60. Best known for playing Princess Leia Organa in Star Wars, she suffered a heart attack and went into cardiac arrest mere days ago during a flight to New York.

Rest in peace, Carrie Fisher. You will be missed.
body_tagged:
As most of you probably already know, Carrie Fisher passed away today at the age of 60. Best known for playing Princess Leia Organa in Star Wars, she suffered a heart attack and went into cardiac arrest mere days ago during a flight to New York.

Rest in peace, Carrie Fisher. You will be missed.
title: R.I.P Carrie Fisher

replies.body: David Bowie was a famous singer, Alan Rickman was a famous actor best known for playing Severus Snape in "Harry Potter", George Michael was a famous singer best known for his Christmas song "Last Christmas", John English was a musician/songwriter/singer, Leonard Cohen was a singer, and Carrie Fisher is explained in the OP.
